iter=int(raw_input(''))

for num in range(0,int(iter)):
	word = raw_input("")
	counter = 0
	for letter in word:
		if letter == "A":
			counter+=1
		elif letter == "D":
			counter+=1
		elif letter == "P":
			counter +=1
		elif letter == "Q":
			counter +=1
		elif letter == "R":
			counter +=1
		elif letter == "B":
			counter +=2
		elif letter == "O":
			counter +=1
	print counter
